example.code:
PS C:\>New-EC2Subnet -VpcId vpc-1a2b3c4d -CidrBlock 10.0.0.0/24
SubnetId : subnet-1a2b3c4d SubnetState : pending VpcId : vpc-1a2b3c4d CidrBlock : 10.0.0.0/24 AvailableIpAddressCount : 251 AvailabilityZone : us-east-1 DefaultForAz : False MapPublicIpOnLaunch : False Tag : {}
example.description: Creates a new VPC subnet with CIDR 10.0.0.0/24 in the current default region.
